title: Why is essay writing necessary to pass a class? - Quora

response.answer_text: Education is about the ability to communicate. The world of work requires that one communicate really well to do well. Essays help you practice formal, complete, clear, concise summing up of ideas and communicating with others—-the teacher, mostly, but there may be others—-what you have learned.
Essays show teachers that their students can assemble the content of the class into a coherent package, ideally leading to new ideas of their own.
